info.name: soundcloud | minimal purple
info.description: a rather minimal soundcloud theme, freshly accented with a dash of soothing purple.
info.additionalInfo:
every orange element is transformed into a light purple, including some modifications including

  • rounded comment avatars
  • purple waveform
  • minimal searchbar
  • and more but im too lazy to list em
also check me out ;) pls an thank
